      • resolverFile

        public static void resolverFile(Reader reader,
                                LineNumberReaderResolver lineNumberReaderResolver)
        使用 LineNumberReaderResolver解析 Reader.

        如果你以前这么写代码:

         
 InputStreamReader read = new InputStreamReader(resourceAsStream, ENCODING);
 try{
     Set<String> set = new HashSet<>();
     log.info("io流开启了");
     BufferedReader bufferedReader = new BufferedReader(read);
     String txt = null;
     while ((txt = bufferedReader.readLine()) != null){ // 读取文件,将文件内容放入到set中
         txt = txt.trim();// 忽略前面前后空格
         txt = txt.replace(" ", "");// 文中过滤空格
         set.add(txt);
     }
 }catch (Exception e){
     log.error(e.getMessage());
 }finally{
     log.info("io流关闭了");
     read.close(); // 关闭文件流
 }
 return set;
        现在可以重构为: 
         InputStreamReader read = new InputStreamReader(resourceAsStream, ENCODING);
 
 final Set<String> set = new HashSet<>();
 
 log.info("io流开启了");
 IOReaderUtil.resolverFile(read, new LineNumberReaderResolver(){
 
     @Override
     public boolean excute(int lineNumber,String line){
         line = line.trim();// 忽略前面前后空格
         line = line.replace(" ", "");// 文中过滤空格
         set.add(line);// 读取文件,将文件内容放入到set中
         return true;
     }
 });
 return set;
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader
        lineNumberReaderResolver - the line number reader resolver
        Since:
        1.4.1
